CustomField.description:
C360: API name of the field we will be mapping FROM. This field name must come from an object designated in the "Customer 360 SObjects" custom setting and noted in the "Map from Object" field in this custom setting.
API names of custom fields must have the "__c" suffix.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: C360: API name of the field we will be mapping FROM. This field name must come from an object designated in the "Customer 360 SObjects" custom setting and noted in the "Map from Object" field in this custom setting.
CustomField.label: Map from field
